title: Microsoft Issues Security Update Fixing 118 Flaws, Two Actively Exploited in the Wild
description: Microsoft has released security updates to fix a total of 118 vulnerabilities across its software portfolio, two of which have come under active exploitation in the wild. Of the 118 flaws, three are rated Critical, 113 are rated Important, and two are rated Moderate in severity.
